paper_abstract: This article describes design challenges of a novel concept enabling natural and intuitive video-mediated collaboration. Typical video-mediated communication systems do not enable deictic gestures nor direct drawing with white board markers, thus limiting communication. We present our novel concept for Natural and Intuitive Video-mediated Collaboration (NIVMC). NIVMC was originally developed for design professionals to enable co-operative sketching, but it may also benefit other user groups.
paper_title: DEVELOPING NATURAL AND INTUITIVE VIDEO-MEDIATED COLLABORATION - NIVMC SYSTEM
